snippet: The director Michael Apted has reached “56 Up” of his documentary series covering the lives of 14 Britons whom he began filming when they were 7.
abstract: Profile of director MIchael Apted, best known for his work on documentary series UP, which covers the lives of 14 Britons whom he began filming when they were 7 years old; what began in 1964 with 7 Up and no longitudinal ambitions is now at 56 Up.
lead_paragraph: The director Michael Apted has reached “56 Up” of his documentary series covering the lives of 14 Britons whom he began filming when they were 7.

headline.seo: Michael Apted, Keeping Up With the ‘Up’ Series
headline.main: They Grow Up, but They Remain a Lifetime Pursuit
headline.print_headline: They Grow Up, But They Remain A Lifetime Pursuit
